# Overview

Outliers are something we always need to consider with continuous survey variables. There aren't hard and fast rules for outlier identification, but [Tukey's Test]( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Outlier#Tukey%27s_fences) provides one method that is easy to apply in a standard way.
